content.label: Yep, so it’s literally one of the best games I’ve ever played.

title.label: One of my favorite games ever

content.label:
The one thing is that even after something intense it still makes you laugh and my favorite character was Grandmammy if you are looking for a great story without requiring hours of play at a time look no further than guess where Crashlands my only complaint is that though it is fun to discover new quests it will be hard to know if you have done a 100% completion 

PS( if you developers are reading this untold millions (me) are screaming out for a Crashlands 2)

This is undeniably the best game playable on iPod in the Apple store. I hope so badly a “Crashlands 2” is coming out. Hell, put in some IAP to fund it and I’ll line those pockets with my little share to help! Or even if you post your website for donations to fund it. This game is that amazing. It’s up there with ‘Terraria’ in the ‘Greatest of All Time’ category. 

The ONLY negative I have is THE SAME ONE MANY OTHERS HAVE DESCRIBED, which makes me think you guys either don’t read this, or worse.. do read this and actively ignore it. The hit-box for that (stupid) robot is horrible. Again, as many have echoed, it has been the cause of so many of my deaths. Why does he trail you? Why can you even click on him in the first place? The only time it was even needed was furthering the initial quest where ‘Hewwy’ takes the packages to the “Bawg”. Other than that...? Please change this, OR, please let us know why you can’t or won’t. If it’s some game-breaking change that would adversely affect the game then OK, I’ll keep sucking it up, no problem!! But if not, just why?

The controls on this game are some of the worst I’ve ever seen.  It makes what could have been a fun game damned near unplayable.  Change the controls guys.  Add in an option for a virtual joystick.  That tap to move nonsense is garbage

title.label: Awesome but shouldn’t have to sign up to get creator mode or perks.

content.label: It needs to have creator mode to unlock after you complete a “portion” of the story mode with all perks to unlock in it by completing certain levels or quests on story mode. I think that is the one thing that would make this game absolutely Perfect for all players to my opinion.

Real DualShock support:

The option to change controller input should be bound to left and right arrows. When you hit X to change controller layout from Xbox to “Shapes”, the bottom face button becomes the back button..so if you hit (on the DualShock) X again to try and change controller settings, it jets you back to the main menu. Very frustrating UI. 

Shapes seems like it’s setup for some non-DualShock controller. 

I REALLY appreciate the GUI size control option. However, even on my iPhone X, the camera has been pulled WAY too far back for mobile. I could understand the scaling for desktop. I REALLY wish there was a camera scaling for the game itself. I want to zoom in to actually be able to see the beautiful artwork. My eyesight isn’t poor, I just really think the zoom level is ridiculous. 

I think when I tried this game years ago it didn’t have this problem on mobile. Was this something that happened when the game became cross platform?
Great game. Should make some kind of purchases available. Legendary armor purchase, sword, etc.... other than that. It’s awesome
I love this game. Please make a sequel !
I LOVE THIS GAME

title.label: Love the game but it needs co-op multiplayer

content.label: Pls do this I wanna play with my friends
I had uninstalled the game around 2-1 years ago and realized that that was not a good idea the game is awsome if you play it right and grandmamy has flashbacks of the war!
Multiplayer on iPad? Can someone help XD

So wow, I was playing this game with touch controls and really liked it, storyline, mechanics, the humor. Then I got a rotor riot controller for my phone! Now I’m absolutely in love! This team is off the charts talented, I also have Levelhead and the quality and polish of their games is absolutely amazing! No joke best game publishers I’ve played, move over blizzard 😉, the humor and care is truly birthed from a labor of love, this is more than a game. Well done guys I gladly will spend to buy your games, even better you don’t nickel and dime with micro transactions. I applaud you good sirs! Take my 5 stars and 7 bucks! My money delivered real gooooood!
One of the best games I’ve ever played on my phone

Probably the best game I’ve ever played on iOS. The one recommendation I’d say is to have at least 2 pets out at once instead of only 1. If you could have a small squad of 2 or even 3 pets, that’d be awesome and more enjoyable so you don’t leave cool pets stuck at your home
One of the best mobile games i’ve ever played. Especially controls-wise.

title.label: Fun but needs a tiny update

content.label: I have had trouble in the past trying to find gassak plant for quests, and also straddlebark, so what I am asking is if you were asked if you could either pick up the gassak plants with the trowel and for the straddlebark could you add that you sometimes get seeds like logtrees and sawgrass so you can plant it

title.label: Favorite mobile game and high on favorite games ever

content.label:
I have got to say that this game is AMAZING! The graphics are polished, the story is just the best, and who could forget the intro to the game along with the music. But, there are a few minor things that needs to be fixed

One: when I try to eat I always accidentally switch my item set. I know this is not an issue on pc and is not really a annoyance for ipad users, but I am on my iPhone and it is just really bothering me.

Two: Say there is a little pond in front of me and I tap on the other side to go around. When I tap on the other side, flux just goes towards the lake and is not going around. Please fix this for our convenience.

I know your new game just came out and your going to put most of your attention on it, but please please please fix the issues I listed.
Great Game, but I wish it was multiplayer
Why Is there no BS

Best money I ever spent on a mobile game.  So refreshing not to have endless grind vs paywalls.  The game had a great pace, good story, and satisfying achievements.  The gameplay mechanics were good too. 

I bought the steam game too. Money well spent.  The cross save user registration needs some cleaning up.  I know you’re implementing new system, and I was able to following the instructions to get cloud saves working, but this process should be cleaner. 

Some suggestions:
Hot swap should do everything, not just gadgets and hot bar.  Would love to hot swap weapon and armor. 

Load outs would be wonderful. 

The data reference should contain all discovered recipes and (most important) what workstations they are built on.  Spent a lot of time recipe searching.  I did enjoy the creature reference in game.  That was good. 

Would *love* a bot or furniture that automatically harvested my potted plants when they ripened.
(Edit: just found the Pot Slapper!  Noice!  Never mind)

Would also love to have an aggressive feature to pets.  It would be epic to have my pet automatically attack anything that takes a swipe at me. 

I think the creatures should have super weaknesses to some types of damage.  That would encourage less of an endgame meta.  

Great game.  Just finished it, but looking forward to tons of post finish gameplay.  I have a lot of payback to dish out.  :)
I’m sad that you aren’t making updates
This game is fantastic and highly recommended it to anyone who is bored

This game was positively stunning and hilarious this game is worth easily 15$. The storyline is amazing and it has hours worth of content...IN THE FIRST RUN THROUGH. if I was being super ?€£¥! Nit picky I would have to say that there isn’t a whole lot of stuff to do after beating the game’s main story and countless side quests/unlocking all the recipes. But that takes like 50 IRL hours to do so it’s not a big deal. Overall this game is was so amazing I cried when I finished it😢.
Overall great game but I’m just wondering why the game is to another company now?

I’ve been looking forever to find a game that I can put some time into on mobile and woah did I find it here. This game is not only encompassing but I can find myself putting in hours before taking a break... truly a sensory experience, and the game is funny! I’m definitely looking forward for more games by @ButterScotch Shenanigans!

title.label: Great Game but TRUE Multiplayer please

content.label: This game is amazing, the story, side missions, writing, weapons, pets and etc is articulate and diverse. I have a girlfriend who loves the game as well and while playing on the same screen it’s just not the most immersive thing right now considering we’re playing on a phone 😓. Either someone’s fingers are blocking the screen or you just lose track of yourself and your whereabouts. If localized or online (Maybe both if I’m not asking for too much) could happen then not only I would be happy with that but the community as well.
Please apply for korean lanquage

I just finished the story mode and I was sad that I finished it. The game is so fun and entertaining. I wish we could have multiplayer and try to survive with more difficult creatures. It was fun playing the game. And I hope you guys add multiplayer.

name.label: 还行哦哦什么昵称好难评论

title.label: 默认的图案标签不显示

content.label: 默认的图案标签在地图上不会显示图案，现在只能在地图上看到label的文字，而看不到图案，这样地图用起来很困难
I played through this game twice now beating all but two bosses and getting kinda close to getting the megagong, amazing game

Having played on both my iPhone and iPad, I have to say that the combat aspect completely kills any fun this game might have. It’s impossible to dodge enemy attacks by moving out of the way.  The gear progression makes no sense compared to the quest lines, and good luck trying to level up a pet.
This is the best game I’ve ever played yet, I love the music in the tundra and I’ve been addicted to this game ever since. If you guys made a number two to this I’d get it even if it was for money
Amazing wonderful crafting adventure game!! So re-playable and worth every cent. Has login function to save to cloud, unlock achievements, and user icons! Hilarious dialogue & storyline!
So ya it’s a great one of my favs but I just can’t beat it so I think you should let anyone get any of the modes for free without having to beat story mode.

i just there are no words to express my raw adoration for this game i just love it to death there is physically nothing anyone could do to stop me from loving its just like WOAH mind-blowing beyond getting your money’s worth it gives you a tiny place of your own to just laugh and build and hangout with your pet alien it’s the best game ever i love you butterscotch shenanigans studios
I’m not trying to make you HAVE to do this but I would like creative mode where you have 99999 of every floor,wall, etc and no damage. Btw great game

title.label: It’s a pretty decent Don’t Starve clone

content.label: A little more forgiving because you respawn after death, but it’s basically Don’t Starve but not as good. Fun app, since Don’t Starve isn’t on iOS

title.label: Love it just needs more for creative

content.label: I Like it allot there’s so much to do in story mode. But the thing with creative mode is there should be bosses ,creative mode trinkets and npc’s

I played Crashlands and enjoyed it a lot until this morning when playing the tundra level and warped back to savannah to find that all of my buildings and pets are completely gone and the map reset and all of my exploring is gone.  I registered and have been saving my game often, to no avail apparently.  So, I recommend the game if you want to play and suddenly have all of your progress disappear about 75% of the way through the game, but otherwise could not due to the disappointment.

I am currently on my third play through of the game and I love it so much! The jokes never get old I always find something new on every play through even though I’ve had this game since launch and it keeps getting better but just please don’t abandon the game. It has such potential but know that I’m done ranting I’ll actually give suggestions. Make it so that creatures can attack through walls even though it’s fun it’s to easy to whack things like glidopods through walls. Add a local multiplayer function and please not like the couch Co op sure it’s fun to play as juice box but it’s much more fun to play as flux and have the ability to be constantly getting stronger also add a utility slot so that you can put something like a harvest bomb in there and don’t have to switch it to a normal slot. Also please expand on pets in stead of just growing or evolving them make it so that you can make them gear. And that’s it thanks for making such amazing games and I hope that if you read this wich you probably didn’t you take some off the suggestions anyway that’s it.
Good on the dev team for always updating the game even 4 years after release
Thank you for the constant updates and support developers
Though this game costs money its TOTALLY WORTH IT. This is a great story game. There’s a lot of side quests so there’s always something to do. 10/10
This is the best app I have ever gotten. Well worth it.

title.label: Best game on the App Store

content.label: I haven’t played a game as extensively as this one since I was a child. I’ve tried plenty of what’s available on the App Store and it never stays installed for more than a week because I tire of it. Crashlands has been on my phone for the better part of a month and I play it every day. Many of the paid games on the App Store are either poorly made mobile versions or cash grabs that aren’t very fun at all. I have no complaints about this game. My one suggestion would be to reformat the quest screen so it’s easier to see your objectives and needed items. It takes a lot longer to figure out what you need to do when you have to reread all the dialogue. Thank you butterscotch shenanigans for gracing my life with this amazing game.

This game is very good I have been playin this game so much and it always has been fun to play especially since you don’t need internet I delete the app just so 8 can play it again all in all a very good game

I really like this game and I have spent many hours playing it but there is one glitch I’ve noticed sometimes the map in the tundra resets but you can fix this by hitting the redraw icon in the upper right of the map hud

Awesome game! Can’t wait for a sequel, and Apple TV support!

I do wish your character could level up via XP, instead of solely gear upgrades.
